title: How do i contact support to make a claim? Having issues charging.
content:
Have tried cleaning the port, different cables/chargers (as well as trying all cables/chargers on others phones, and they all work fine).
Apparently you can no longer telephone support, and have tried the claim web page that doesn't recognise the imei/serial number. Can't use chat, as you have to be a paying user. Believe I have exhausted all possibilities....?
Thanks.
